name: 2021.01/ProjetoV/Mirror's Lab
description:
In the year 1998, a scientist suffers a catastrophic accident in a laboratory, protecting himself inside a capsule, and waking up in the year 2047 to instruct his past self to follow a different path.

Julia Vanti - 2D Artist

Leonardo Gomez - 3D modeler

Maurício Valvassori - Programmer

Cristian Dreyer - Programmer
